text: Ruby or Python instead of PHP?
I'm considering learning a new language as an alternative to PHP.
Which one is a better language based on the following four criteria, and any other qualifiers you may have?
Keeping the original question intact, I'd like to add one more pair of questions.

lis.text: Which is quicker to code with?
Which is quicker to learn? (Based on personal experience only please - to avoid holywars.)

text: Sorry for not clarifying - mostly web development, some desktop programming would be a nice bonus.
